Model structure

Create a model structure for a decision model.

ModStruct

Format

R6Class object.

Fields

disease_progression

An object of class StatModSurv for modeling the progression of disease over time.

utility

A StatMod statistical model used to predict utility.

costs

A StatMod statistical model used to predict costs.

treatmtent_duration

A StatMod statistical model used to predict treatment duration.

adverse_events

A StatMod statistical model used to predict adverse events.

Members

(disease_progression, utility, costs, treatment_duration, adverse_events)

Create a new object of class ModStruct.

Contents

  • Format
  • Fields
  • Members
